articles.title: South Africa wants to introduce a vaccine passport – but there’s a catch - BusinessTech
articles.description: The Department of Tourism says that it wants to introduce a vaccine passport for South Africa, but there are a number of international and legislative hurdles that need to be addressed.
articles.content:

articles.title: Covid-19 vaccine distribution: Why J&J is accused of using colonial tactics - News24
articles.description: The New York Times reported that the Aspen plant in Gqeberha exported J&J vaccines to Europe, while African countries are struggling to get access.
articles.content:
Pharmaceutical company Johnson and Johnson (J&J) is being accused of using colonial tactics by exporting locally-produced Covid-19 vaccines to Europe while Africa is in need.
